column2: ICAO: WASO) is an airport in Babo
column4: Indonesia. The airport resides at an elevation of 3 m (10 ft) above mean sea level. It has one concrete surface runway measuring 2
column6: 874 ft) in length. The previous runway length of 950 meters has been extended to 2
column7: 400 meters in early August 2014. Currently there are no commercial flights operate from this Airport. Address: Jl. Irarutu Papua Barat Nusei
column8: Babo Kabupaten Teluk Bintuni Papua Barat 98363 Indonesia
